contained-index.description: Information about the parent index of an entity.

parent-relative-position.description: Position of an entity relative to its parent entity.

is-fru.description: Whether the entity a replaceable unit.

ls-name.description: The LS name of the entity.

logic-entitys.description: List of information about logical entity.

logic-entity.description: Configure information about a logical entity.

parent-index.description: Information about the parent index of an entity.

parent-relative-position.description: Position of an entity relative to its parent entity.

slot-num.description: Number of slots on a chassis.

board-num.description: Number of boards on a chassis.

fan-num.description: Number of fans on a chassis.

power-num.description: Number of power modules for a chassis.

status-last-change.description: Time when the entity running status last changed.

entity-last-change.description: Time when the entity on chassis last changed.

dust-clean-cycle.description: Interval at which air filter dust is cleaned.

last-clean-date.description: Date when dust was last cleaned.

up-to-last-clean.description: Time past since dust was last cleaned.

monitor-board-changes.description: List of time when board status changes.

monitor-board-change.description: Operational data of time when the status of a board changes.

status-last-change.description: Time when the board running status changes.

entity-last-change.description: Time when the board entity changes.

up-time.description: MPU running time, expressed in the number of timeticks.

register-time.description: Time when a board goes Up.

up-time.description: LPU running time, expressed in the number of timeticks.

next-service-type.description: Type of next started service board.

pic-num.description: Number of PICs on an LPU.

sub-slot-num.description: Number of slots on a subcard.

register-time.description: Time when a board goes Up.

dest-slot.description: Destination slot name. For example, board 3 is input as 0/3.

up-time.description: SFU running time, expressed in the number of timeticks.

register-time.description: Time when a board goes Up.

port-num.description: Number of ports on a card.

pic.description: Operational data of physical interface card.

up-time.description: Time when a card goes Up.

memory-size.description: Memory size of a CF card.

memory-used.description: Used memory of a CF card.

memory-free.description: Available memory of a CF card.

position.description: Port position. The position is expressed in the format of slotID/cardID/portID. For example, 1/0/1. Here 1/0/1 is an example. The value may vary with devices.

type.description: Port type, such as ETH, POS, or OTN.

last-up-time.description: Time when a port last went Up.

last-down-time.description: Time when a port last went Down.

optical-equipped.description: Flag indicating whether an optical transceiver is equipped.

is-switchoverable.description: Flag indicating whether a switchover can be performed on the entity.

sequence.description: Sequence number of a historical alarm.

generated-time.description: Time when a historical alarm is generated.

register-time.description: Time when a board goes Up.

export-version.description: Version of NetStream statistics packets. The value of IPv4 can be 5,9 or ipfix, the value of IPv6 can be 9 or ipfix.

as-type.description: AS number of a specified IP address. The available options are origin-as (start AS number) and peer-as (adjacent AS number).

bgp-nexthop.description: Whether exported statistics contain BGP next hop information. Version 5 does not support BGP next hop.

template-timeout-rate.description: The interval for refreshing the template.

option-template-timeout-rate.description: Interval for refreshing the Option template.

option-template-refresh-rate.description: Packet-interval refreshing time of the option template.

option-data-timeout-rate.description: Interval for refreshing the option data.

agg-active-age.description: Specify the active aging time of aggregation flows.

minutes.description: Specify the active aging time (mins) of aggregation flows.

agg-active-age-minutes.description: Specify the active aging time (mins) of aggregation flows.

seconds.description: Specify the active aging time (secs) of aggregation flows.

agg-active-age-seconds.description: Specify the active aging time (secs) of aggregation flows.

agg-inactive-age-seconds.description: Inactive aging time of aggregation flows.

origin-active-age.description: Active aging time of original flows.

minutes.description: Active aging time (mins) of original flows.

origin-active-age-minutes.description: Active aging time (mins) of original flows.

seconds.description: Active aging time (secs) of original flows.

origin-active-age-seconds.description: Active aging time (secs) of original flows.

origin-inactive-seconds.description: Inactive aging time of original flows.

tcpflag-enable.description: Whether tcp-flag information is extracted during the processing of sampling packets.

mpls-aware-enable.description: Whether Layer 3 labels are extracted during the processing of sampling packets. The default value is ip-only, that is, not to extract the label.label-only indicates that only the label is extracted; label-and-ip indicates that both the label and IP address are extracted.

interface-option-enable.description: Flow of statistics about interface options, including the interface index for enabling NetStream in inbound direction or outbound direction, and corresponding sampling values.

ttl-flag.description: Whether exported statistics contain TTL information.

sequence-number-fix.description: Whether the numbering mode of IPFIX version packet is fixed mode.

srv6-aware.description: Whether collect inner layer header of SRv6 packet.

sampler-rates.description: List of configure global sampler instance.

export-ipv4-hosts.description: List of configure export vpn destination IPv4 address instance.

export-ipv4-host.description: Configure export vpn destination IPv4 address instance.

port.description: UDP port number of the NSC.

flexflow-records.description: List of configure flexible flow instance.

source-address.description: Indicates the aggregation based on source addresses.

source-as.description: Indicates that the statistics to be sent to the NSC contain source AS information.

sampler-rate-lower-limits.description: List of sampler rate lower-limits state.

fix-packets-lower-limit.description: Lower limit for fixed-packet-number-based sampling ratio.

fix-time-lower-limit.description: Lower limit for fixed-time-based sampling ratio.

random-packets-lower-limit.description: Lower limit for random-packet-number-based sampling ratio.

success-num.description: Success times of exporting packets or templates.

failed-num.description: Failure times of exporting packets or templates.

ip-address.description: IP address or address segment of the endpoint of an LSP.
